text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
On the day of the exhibition race, we<n>get to watch
Tannhauser run.<n>Afterward...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I think that's basically how<n>things went. That's why
at this point...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Tannhauseeer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah—Kita, Sato! You came to watch me!<n>Sorry, I really flubbed
it big-time, huh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
What are you talking about?<n>Tannhauser, you were
sooooo...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: So cool out there!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
On the final stretch, when Rice was<n>sprinting after the front
runner<n>Bourbon, you were hot on their heels<n>and steadily
closing the gap.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But it wasn't working! You couldn't<n>quite reach them! With
just 200<n>meters to the finish line, you could've<n>changed
strategies and protected your<n>third place position.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
But you never gave up. Even though<n>you knew you
wouldn't catch them,<n>you still gave everything you had until<n>
the very end.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but that's why I didn't notice<n>the racer coming up
from behind. And<n>where'd it get me? Fourth place.<n>Haha, I
really don't have a good<n>endgame.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Still, you had some sort of strategy,<n>right? You tried to speed
up despite<n>knowing the risk.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Nah, that wasn't a strategy. I<n>was just trying to win
the race.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Isn't that what all racers do? There's<n>no point if we don't
aim to win, is<n>there?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But I guess a loser like me shouldn't<n>be handing out advice,
huh? Haha... I<n>knew just trying wouldn't be<n>enough.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I've got to keep pushing myself<n>nonstop to get better, just
like Teio<n>and McQueen do.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Which means I gotta trainmore. Let's see, I guess starting fromtomorrow...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Rustle, rustle...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa! My notebook!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I'll grab it for you! ...Oh, wow! The<n>level of detail in these
notes is<n>incredible!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ah—this is the book you carry<n>everywhere.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
"Special Pre-Race Training Routine,"<n>"Early Morning Running
Checklist,"<n>"Ikuno's Recommended Gym<n>Regimen by
Muscle Group"...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, look at all the routines and<n>schedules! And you've
written "Gotta<n>work hard!" so many times...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Aah, don't read that! It's just a<n>bunch of embarrassing
scribbles...<n>Urgh.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You haven't been doing all of these<n>routines, have you?
Every day? Even<n>with all that community service?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Is that weird? I thought it was a pretty<n>normal amount of
work...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: This is a normal amount?! I'm noexpert, but this feels like way toomuch!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Still, I'm pretty sure I need to increase<n>my weight training.
Hmm, I'll have to<n>rearrange some things... My<n>schedule's
always so packed.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I don't have any secret weapons or<n>special skills. If I want
to win against<n>those monster racers, there's only<n>one
option.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I've just gotta work as hard as I can.<n>Push myself more
and more... so I can<n>live up to the expectations of<n>
everyone supporting me.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Tannhauser was so amazing on the<n>track, but she still
doesn't consider<n>herself special.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Maybe that's what being at this<n>school does to you.
Tannhauser was<n>definitely amazing, but there are even<n>
stronger racers...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, everyone here is on a whole<n>other level. I knew
that'd be the case,<n>but still...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: ...Okay, we're all here! Wanna get<n>started?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Oh? Something's happening over<n>there...

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, let's get this strategy sesh<n>rolling! Us ex-convicts
gotta make our<n>grand comeback!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Woo, ex-comics! Wait, what's that?!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
I'm just saying our community<n>service is finally over,
yeah? We<n>seriously worked our butts<n>off—headpats all
around!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: We brought it on ourselves, you<n>know.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Now that we have more free time, it<n>would be nice if we
could work<n>together to improve our skills.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I think we all know we're not exactly<n>Tracen's best and
brightest. But<n>different perspectives might help us<n>change
that.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
I agree. If you recall, I was trying to<n>organize a joint training
session in the<n>first place. But somehow we got off<n>track...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Seriously, how did we getdragged into this? We always seem todraw the short straw when we'rewith you guys.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Huuuh? You're not coming, Nature?<n>But I wanted to run with
you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ngh... This was all your fault in the<n>first place... Also, I didn't
say I<n>wouldn't do it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Hehe. All right then, let's kick off the<n>meeting! For victory!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
They're so focused all of a sudden. I<n>feel like I barely know
them...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
They're all serious about getting first<n>place. I guess at
Tracen, that's a<n>normal thing, huh.
